title: iboss - Web Analytics Metrics Report
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of web activity, enabling organizations to monitor user behavior, detect policy violations, and optimize web usage.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of web activity, enabling organizations to monitor user behavior, detect policy violations, and optimize web usage.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using metrics. Please follow the Configuration steps [here](/integrations/iboss) to enable metrics collection. Ensure the `Collect web metrics` option is enabled to collect these metrics.
- All web metrics are collected once per day, once the complete daily iboss report is available. Please ensure to set the dashboard time range to at least `Past 1 Day` to view the data.
- Filters:
  - `reporter_node` applies to all widgets
  - `domain` applies to widgets in `Domains` group
  - `search_term` applies to widgets in `Search Trends` group
  - `category` applies to widgets in `Categories` group
  - `user` applies to widgets in `Users` group
